20200606 CHURCHILL DOWNS 2 2 $2,200 N Y http://www.test.equineline.com/to/be/determined/00003.htm update on line 42: + Jack Gave Back (2018 g. by Honor Code). Winner at 2 and 4, 2022, $81,655. (ZIA, $13,200); 5 wins at 3, $151,253, in Canada. Sent from United States to Venezuela in 2015. (Total: $200,814). Dam of 3 foals, 3 to race, 1 winner-- Dam is in line 46: **Tioga**, by Hadif.
